name: Luther DRAYTON, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS PHILADELPHIA, CRIMINAL DIVISION, and its President Judge, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Drayton v. Court of Common Pleas Philadelphia, Criminal Division

parties: Luther DRAYTON, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS PHILADELPHIA, CRIMINAL DIVISION, and its President Judge, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 8th day of July, 2015, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and Extraordinary Relief is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
118 A.3d 1106
Luther DRAYTON, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS PHILADELPHIA, CRIMINAL DIVISION, and its President Judge, Respondent.
No. 60 EM 2015.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 8, 2015.
